# isValid

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the timer is currently valid.

## Declaration

```swift
var isValid: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver is still capable of firing or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if the timer has been invalidated and is no longer capable of firing.

## Retrieving Timer Information

- **fireDate**: The date at which the timer will fire.
- **timeInterval**: The timer’s time interval, in seconds.
- **userInfo**: The receiver’s `userInfo` object.
